item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Biography I am a PhD Candidate in the Vision and Cognitive Neuroscience Lab at McMaster University. My general interest is in vision science, with particular focus on perceptual learning, face perception, and psychophysics.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: #This is an example of using the custom widget to create your own homepage section. I have been the teaching instructor for the following courses at McMaster University: PNB 3XE3: Inferential Statistics (2017, 2018) I have been a teaching assistant for the following courses at McMaster University: PSYCH 710: Statistics for Experimental Psychology (2014, 2015, 2016)
